desc:
Last updated: 30/11/2023


1. Introduction:

Welcome to mommygk.com. This privacy policy is designed to inform you about the types of personal information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it.


2. Information We Collect:

Personal Information: We do not collect any personal information.


Non-Personal Information: We may also collect non-personal information, such as browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request.


3. How We Use Your Information:

Non-personal information may be used for analytical purposes, to enhance the user experience, and for troubleshooting and maintenance purposes.


4. Cookies and Similar Technologies:

We may use cookies and similar technologies to collect non-personal information. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect the functionality of the website.


5. Third-Party Links:

Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any site you visit.


6. Security:

We take reasonable precautions to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.


7. Children's Privacy:

We do not collect any personal information of any children.


8. Changes to This Privacy Policy:

We may update our privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the date of the latest update will be indicated at the top.
